education.title: Bachelor
education.content:
the 'Computer Engineering' bachlor takes six semesters.
The main objective of this training is to train operational and competent IT specialists in the various fields of IT in particular, the design and development of software, Web technologies, the implementation of information systems, configuration and network administration, database administration, new mobile technologies, data analysis etc.

education.title: Skilled Technician in Software Development Diploma
education.content: The 'Skilled Technician in Software Development' is a support professional development and maintenance of computer applications. It intervenes, usually on behalf of companies Services and Computer Engineering, in many application areas (industry, management, leisure etc.).Upstream of the project the technician is responsive to customer expectations. This study accurately a number of parameters to carry out his mission; these include specifications, capacity of the technical environment and the constraints of the customer's production system. Downstream, it participates in the commissioning and technical support of the application.
